channel.title: tensorflow on tomis9's cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in tensorflow on tomis9's cookbook

item.title: tensorflow
item.description: 1. What is tensorflow and why would you use it? tensorflow is a machine learning framework which has APIs to Python, C++ and R and let’s you evaluate any machine learning algorithm, especially deep learning: quickly (all the computations are performed in C++) easily - you can view your results in a GUI - Tensorboard on a huge amount of data, as tensorflow scales easily to many machines and can even make use of GPU.
